sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define the go-to-market approach to reach ICPs with clear positioning, prioritized channels, a coordinated launch plan, and measurable outcomes.

sections.title: ICP & Segmentation
sections.content: Ideal customer profiles, segments, personas, use cases, pains, and buying triggers; account targeting criteria and prioritization.

sections.title: Messaging & Positioning
sections.content: Value propositions, positioning statement, proof points, competitive differentiation, objections handling, and core assets.

sections.title: Channels & Tactics
sections.content: Owned/earned/paid channels across lifecycle; campaigns, budgets, and expected reach; sales motions and enablement.

sections.title: Launch Plan & Readiness
sections.content: Milestones, integrated timeline, owners, and cross-functional readiness (sales, support, docs, website, release notes).

sections.title: Measurement & KPIs
sections.content: North-star and leading indicators, attribution model, reporting cadence, and post-launch review process.
